content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Hassan. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what type of tenancy you are looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for a 6-month lease.

25 square meters.

I am a student and I am dependable and responsible.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

Please let me know the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Hassan. Based on the information you provided, I would be willing to rent the apartment to you for a monthly rental price of €300. This price is based on the size of the apartment and the duration of the lease, as well as the responsibility and reliability you have demonstrated as a potential tenant. I believe this price is fair and reasonable, and I would be happy to work with you to finalize the rental agreement. Do you have any questions or concerns about this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €300 per month.

I will pay the first month's rent in advance.

I will sign the rental agreement as soon as possible.

I will pay the remaining rent on time.

Thank you for your cooperation, Mister Heine.

Best regards,
Hassan Rahman
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your prompt response, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to sign the rental agreement and pay the first month's rent in advance. I am happy to hear that you are a responsible and reliable tenant, and I am confident that you will fulfill your obligations under the rental agreement. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. Have a great day, Hassan!
name: Heinrich Heine
